text:
SA•781/SA-781M ASME BPVC.II.A-2025 
S19. Cleaning of Stainless Steels 
S19.l Final cleaning of the casting surfaces shall be 
performed in accordance with one of the cleaning methods 
in Practice A 380 or Specification A 967 as agreed upon 
between the purchaser and the supplier. Acceptance testing 
shall be subject to agreement between the purchaser and 
supplier. 
1262
